DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Safety Autologous ADRC Treatment Degenerative Damage Knee Articular Cartilage
DOC.detailed_description: Patients verify diagnosis knee joint osteoarthritis ( degenerative damage knee articular cartilage ) undergo knee arthroscopic debridement . 28 day later patient undergo liposuction front abdominal wall local anesthesia . After autologous ADRC extract use Celution 800/CRS System ( Cytori Therapeutics Inc ) harvest adipose tissue . Extracted ADRC administer one-time intraarticularly .
